quoteText: Custom Audiences and Matching . Unless you have opted out, we may share certain information (such as your email address) with third parties – such as Facebook and Google – so that we can better target ads and content to our Users, and others with similar interests, within their services.
title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties
